name: Cursmas Royal
description:
--- The Game---

You are the newest player in the latest infinite man battle royal game to sweep the market 'Cursmas Royal'.  But something seems wrong here.  Is the game actually cursed?  All the players seem to be mindlessly targeting you for no apparent reason.  How long can you survive in this messed up, unfair 1vAll shooter.  

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This was a game made for the ShenaniJam 2019 game jam.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---- Controls --- -- Keyboard--
  • WASD -- Move
  • Mouse -- Aim
  • Left Click -- Shoot
-- Controller/Game Pad--
  • Left Stick -- Move
  • Right Stick -- Aim
  • R2/Right Trigger -- Shoot
-- Credits --
  • Developer -- Digx7
  • Engine -- Unity
  • Sound Courtesy of -- FreeSound.com
  • Moral support -- ShenaniJam Discord
